addressList.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site. Ipv6 compatible.

ipAddresses.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site.

markedForRemoval.description: flag indicating whether the witness site is deleted or not

password.description: password used to communicate with Metro Availability Witness Site

username.description: username used to communicate with Metro Availability Witness Site

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the Metro Availability Witness Site

allHypervNodesInFailoverCluster.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether all the Hyper-V nodes in the NOS cluster (that are not marked for removal)are a part of a Hyper-V failover cluster

clusterFunctions.description: This field describes the type of cluster

clusterUuid.description: Uuid of the cluster this entity belongs to

credential.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this propertyindicates the credential for the account that has permissions to modify the domain account representing the NOS cluster

domain.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates the AD domain name that this cluster is a part of

enableEfficientMetricSync.description: Indicates if the metric syncing from PE to PC should be downsampled

enforceRackableUnitAwarePlacement.description: Indicates whether RackableUnit (RU) aware placement has been enforced.

gpuDriverVersion.description: Host driver version of the GPU

nosClusterAndHostsDomainJoined.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether the NOS cluster and the constituent hosts are all joined to the same domain

ssdPinningPercentageLimit.description: This field describes the allowable percentage pinning on the ssd

storageType.description: This field describes the storage type of cluster

externalClientEnabled.description: Indicates whether external iscsi initiators are enabled or not

enabled.description: Whether data in transit encryption is enabled.
enabled.notes: Set to true/false to enable/disable data in transit encryption.

lastDisabledTimestampSecs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.
lastDisabledTimestampSecs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.

lastEnabledTimestampSecs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last enabled.
lastEnabledTimestampSecs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was enabled.

addressValue.description: Address of the proxy either IPv4 or IPv6

port.description: Port on which proxy is binding
port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

proxyTypes.description: Proxy types to send applicable traffic
proxyTypes.notes: Proxy types to send applicable traffic. Supports 'http' 'https', and 'socks' proxy configuration.

deleteIntentSet.description: Setting this to True will start a background process to delete all files from recycle bin. Deletion is still in progress if this is set to True in a GET call.
deleteIntentSet.notes: Indicates an intent to delete all files from recycle bin

recycleBinDisabledReason.description: If present, this indicates the reason why recycle bin is disabled temporarily by the system.
recycleBinDisabledReason.notes: Reason why recycle bin is disabled by the system

recycleBinDisabledTimestampSecs.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds when recycle bin was disabled by the system.
recycleBinDisabledTimestampSecs.notes: Timestamp when recycle bin was disabled

recycleBinTTLSecs.description: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin. Setting this to 0 will disable recycle bin.
recycleBinTTLSecs.notes: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin

port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

serverAddress.description: Address of SMTP server, either IPv4 or IPv6

addressList.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site. Ipv6 compatible.

ipAddresses.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site.

username.description: username used to communicate with Metro Availability Witness Site

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the Metro Availability Witness Site

drsEnabled.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drsEnabled.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

drsVmBehaviour.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drsVmBehaviour.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

haEnabled.description: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.
haEnabled.notes: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.

inUse.description: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.
inUse.notes: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.

registered.description: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not
registered.notes: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not

enabled.notes: Set to true/false to enable/disable data in transit encryption.
